entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
